import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./productLIst.css"; const products = [ { id: 1, category: 'clothing', img: }, { id: 2, category: 'clothing', img: 'img2.jpg' }, { id: 3, category: 'clothing', img: 'img3.jpg' }, { id: 4, category: 'clothing', img: 'img4.jpg' }, { id: 5, category: 'clothing', img: 'img5.jpg' }, { id: 6, category: 'clothing', img: 'img6.jpg' }, { id: 7, category: 'clothing', img: 'img7.jpg' }, { id: 8, category: 'clothing', img: 'img8.jpg' }, { id: 9, category: 'clothing', img: 'img9.jpg' }, { id: 10, category: 'clothing', img: 'img10.jpg' }, { id: 11, category: 'electronics', img: 'img11.jpg' }, { id: 12, category: 'electronics', img: 'img12.jpg' }, { id: 13, category: 'electronics', img: 'img13.jpg' }, { id: 14, category: 'electronics', img: 'img14.jpg' }, { id: 15, category: 'electronics', img: 'img15.jpg' }, { id: 16, category: 'electronics', img: 'img16.jpg' }, { id: 17, category: 'electronics', img: 'img17.jpg' }, { id: 18, category: 'electronics', img: 'img18.jpg' }, { id: 19, category: 'electronics', img: 'img19.jpg' }, { id: 20, category: 'electronics', img: 'img20.jpg' }, { id: 21, category: 'accessories', img: 'img21.jpg' }, { id: 22, category: 'accessories', img: 'img22.jpg' }, { id: 23, category: 'accessories', img: 'img23.jpg' }, { id: 24, category: 'accessories', img: 'img24.jpg' }, { id: 25, category: 'accessories', img: 'img25.jpg' }, { id: 26, category: 'accessories', img: 'img26.jpg' }, { id: 27, category: 'accessories', img: 'img27.jpg' }, { id: 28, category: 'accessories', img: 'img28.jpg' }, { id: 29, category: 'accessories', img: 'img29.jpg' }, { id: 30, category: 'accessories', img: 'img30.jpg' } ]; const ProductList = () => { const [menu, setMenu] = useState('all'); // Filter the products based on the selected category const filteredProducts = menu === 'all' ? products : products.filter(product => product.category === menu); return ( <>
  • setMenu('all')}> All
  • setMenu('electronics')}> Electronics
  • setMenu('clothing')}> Clothing
  • setMenu('accessories')}> Accessories
{filteredProducts.map(product => ( ))}
); }; export default ProductList;
